modName: Aunts Sisters and Daughters of Skyrim
summary:
!!! The MUSCLES are not part of this mod !!!
Aunty is back - she has a sword and look whom she brought !
Adds 33 female warriors as possible followers (including teenagers).
Introducing Bethesda's unused Huki Seven-Swords and a permanent Salma (duplicate).
Fixes Vanilla Bug (No follower dialo
descriptionHtml:
!!! [size=4]The [/size][size=4][color=#0000ff]MUSCLES[/color][/size][size=4] and body tattoo are [color=#ff0000]NOT[/color] a part of this mod[/size] !!!
They won't look like in the pics if you don't use "Muscular Women" by Elmanouche AND "Muscular Women - Armours"
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8873/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8873/[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32521/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32521/[/url]

WARNING - Many of them have the OPPOSITE GENDER ANIMATION (Lydia-like) !
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]Aunty is back - she has a sword and look whom she brought[/size] !

Adds 33 female warriors as possible followers (including teenagers)
with extra vanilla voice comments.
Introducing Bethesda's unused Huki Seven-Swords, a permanent Salma (duplicate), a daughter of Ulfric ...
Fixes Vanilla Bug (No follower dialogue for FemaleNord voice) !!! (Thanks to Terzaerian)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
THIS IS NOT A BEAUTY CONTEST - this is the rough north with war and dangers present !
I wanted a few female warriors who would look like having seen combat.
But then the mod started to grow into oblivion - expanded, reorganized, altered since some month.

IMAGINE them as former soldiers, mercenaries, adventurers or even ex-bandits who visit their relatives.
The small ones are a product of their environment - swimming with or against the stream.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

USE [size=4]NPCs do not rescale shrink resize when doing idle stuff[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41304/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41304/[/url]
to keep them from shrinking/growing when doing idle/sandbox stuff.

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=4]Heavily RECOMMENDED FILES for some WEAPONS[/size]:

"2hander-as-1hander" by Zillier
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22212/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22212/[/url]
to have some of them dual wield two greatswords, battleaxes or warhammers.
(So here is actually a purpose of having the muscles :P )

"Warrior Within Weapons - OUTDATED" by BloodFree
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35577/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35577/[/url]
for the Redguards and a few others.

Non-enchanted duplicate of the EBONY BLADE DA08 (from the quest "The Whispering Door")
for the smaller ones as a swift 2 hand sword (already included in my mod).

The MODS are kind of REQUIREDÂ 
to have the weapons, because the duplicates depend on the nif files/textures of the original mods !!!

You could try without. They just shouldn't have a weapon then. But I never tried :-P

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]25 EXAMPLES[/size]:


SALMA TARAN (duplicate) (Nightgate Inn): Yes, the one from the quest, who disappears afterwards. I always disliked that you can't keep her as a follower. She stays at the Nightgate Inn.
Has that fine Eagle Great Sword from "Warrior Within Weapons".
You probably shouldn't take her to Ironbind Barrows before finishing that quest, because ... time space paradoxon ... ;-)
(My attempt to make a spawn-after-quest condition failed.)
( Family name "Taran" found in [url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Redguard_Names]http://uesp.net/wiki/Lore:Redguard_Names[/url] )

SAMAARA TARAN: Younger sister of SALMA, plays instruments sometimes when idle. Dual wields 2 Eagle Swords from "Warrior Within Weapons"

LAILANA: Daughter of Laila Law-Giver. Visits the market and the "Bee and Barb".

ELISIANA: Daughter of Elisif the Fair. Little snob wears circlet and jewelry.
Can be married (untested)

ULRIKE (daughter of Ulfric): Has a thing for Huki Seven Swords and mostly follows her around.
Invited Huki to sleep in the palace, much to her fathers dislike. Not interested in his rebellion.
I suspect she is conspiring with Huki to kill him and take over.

HUKI SEVEN-SWORDS (duplicate) (Windhelm): one of Skyrims UNUSED NPCs from Windhelm.
[url=http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Huki_Seven-Swords#Huki_Seven-Swords]http://uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Huki_Seven-Swords#Huki_Seven-Swords[/url]

ARGISA The Bulwark (Markarth): Sister of Argis, tallest of them all. Lives in Vlindrel Hall and wanders around in Understone Keep.

CALDERA (Windhelm): (originally made to replace Calder): Adopted step-sister of Calder with greenish skin. Rumor has it that she has blood from Akavir in her veins.
Lives in Winterhold (Frozen Heart Inn) searching for the book "Mysterious Akavir", uses Serpent Greatsword from "Warrior Within Weapons"

JORDANA (Solitude): younger sister of Jordis The Sword Maiden, visits market and the Inn, wanders the docks, lives in Proudspire Manor.

FALEENIS (Markarth, Understone Keep): yup, Faleen has a sister - a fierce looking one - and she brings her daughter ...
FALEENIA. Both have elf-like eyes. Faleenis has that Eagle Great Sword from "Warrior Within Weapons".
Both wander around in Understone Keep.

HROKINA (Markarth, Silver Blod Inn): hates almost all people, angry face. Seems to ignore her sleep routine and plays instruments to disturb her siblings at night :S

MENARA (Karthwasten): on the war path to find her missing sister Mena. So take her along on that (vanilla) quest :)

UTHGRID The Unbeaten: Cousin of Uthgerd. Lives in Uthgerds house (no extra bedroll) visits the Inn, the market and patrols the city.

ASSURA: Daughter of the Jarl of Winterhold -patrols the town, visits Birna and the Frozen Heart Inn.

TEMBIA: Daughter of Temba (of course) -helps at the mill, eats and sleeps where Temba does.

BOTIS: Ivarsted/Fellstar Farm, Fastred's aunt, visits Inn and helps at the farm

BRINALA MERILIS: Daughter of retired Imperial Legate Brina Merilis, patrols Dawnstar (not following Brina -> dependencies to vanilla NPCs are not wise, I heard).

ANNIKA Crag-Jumper: Who's daughter could that be ??? -helps with mining and wanders the town.

EYDISA: Sister of Eydis. Brings more safety to Old Hroldan Inn. Helps outside.
SKULINA: Daughter of Eydis. Plays an instrument sometimes. Also goes outside.

GROSTIS and GRALNIA: Sister and niece of Grosta. Help out at Heartwood Mill.

GILFRIS and GILFRENIA: Gilfres half-sister with little elven blood plus daughter. They sleep in the empty Mixwater Mill worker house and Gilfre with her work.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
See screenshot with the list for more info (if you can make sense of it).
Did that to keep track of what I did (outdated here and there). Only a few AI schedules are listed!
Pink - planned, [...] - default value of vanilla original

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]BEFRIENDING the NPCs is simple[/size]:

Give them a beer and they will be a thankful follower forever (sorry, no milk for the younger ones).

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]RECOMMENDATIONS for more fun[/size]:

Simple multiple followers by kuertee
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31581/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31581/[/url]
Has everything that I need for my followers (including idle sandbox behaviour) !

CS Tag and Track NPCs by CS aka Mush
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25554/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25554/[/url]

Muscular Women by Elmanouche and his MW - Armors
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8873/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8873/[/url]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32521/

ADEC Full Body Tattoo by Danteh
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16451/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16451/[/url]
(needs to be placed in Data/textures/MW/female to work with Muscular Women mod)

Dual Sheath Redux by Neovalen
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/[/url]
together with
XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/[/url]

Wearable Lanterns by Chesko
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/[/url]
also for followers to have both hands for dual wielding

Follower Trap Safety by Alek
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11609/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11609/[/url]

Player Headtracking by Maegfaer
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23600/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23600/[/url]
Your Char looks at NPCs for a choosen time.

Zarias_Piercings by Zaria
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11283/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11283/[/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[size=4]DETAILS[/size]:

33 females with 3 different age stages -> 18x teens, 6x average age, 9x age 40 (CK head texture age 40), all essential

NAMES are kept simple to prevent my brain from overloading (e.g. Gilfre-> Gilfris, Gilfrenia / Eydis -> Eydisa, Skulina)

OPPOSITE GENDER annimation for 24 NPCs !!! YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED !!!

HEIGHT/ WEIGHT:
0.9 to 1.13 / mostly 80 - 100 to benefit from "Muscular Women" by Elmanouche
All NPCs set to "Nord" for "Nords and Orcs" version.

AGE varies from my teenage adaption to the Uthgerd-like "SkinHeadFemaleNordComplexion_Age40".

VOICES:
FemaleNord voice for Aeris, Argisa the Bulwark, Eydisa, Huki Seven-Swords, Menara
Young eager: what else should the small ones use ? Many say "Why don't you stay a while." or "I wish I could go with you."
Sultry: makes use of "You are the handsome one. You and I should spend some time together".
Conscending: for those who are grumpy by nature (still need to search for some nice comments for that voice type)
Darkelf voice: fits perfectly to the older NPCs, provides a large variety of INTERESTING COMMENTS as followers.
(Especially in dwarfen structures they will start blubbering and share their knowledge.) Also allows usage of some unfriendly comments.

Extra COMMENTS:
Someday I found something that handles comments with NPCs listed. So I added my NPCs :-)
-Increased the vanilla time span after which some lines would be repeated, or it would get on your nerves and make no sense.

AI PACKS:
Made tons of them for daily routines ( help out their relatives, eat, sleep, visit inn, patrol, follow another new NPC, hang around ... )
Made use of unused vanilla AI packs. There are various for the Housecarls. Seems like Bethesda often changed plans, but didn't clean up.
(Moved some to the bottom to disable them on purpose.)

RELATIONSHIPS to other NPCs (mostly family members), whatever the benefit of this is :-D
(Not talking about conversations like between Fastred and her mother ! )

AI DATA (mood, confidence, ...), STATS, CLASSES, COMBAT STYLE depending on the NPC (different courage).
Tes5Edit doen't name the moods properly. Will be fixed by them after 3.0.31 !

ELF-LIKE eyes for some as result of the war with the Dominion (mostly don't live in the towns -> less discrimination)

Extra SLEEP ROLLS in various places ( might conflict with mods that change the vanilla interiors) and other things like wood piles, leanmarkes, bar stooles, a tent in Darkwater.

LEVELING up with you to 25 (teens) / 50 (for the others)

CUSTOM OUTFIT SETS - used for dfferent occasions (x for default, y to visit an inn)
e.g. armor plus circlet (Elisiana), armor set without bracers or helmets, hide armor plus boots
(NPCs require a set to dress properly from the start.)

3 new COIN PURSES for the rich chicks (base values: 250, 500, 1000)

Generated the necessary FACEGEN DATA !

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

KNOWN (vanilla) ISSUES / NEED to KNOW:
-dual wielding NPCs won't draw 2nd weapon until 1st fight

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PROBLEMS / CHANGE things to your liking:

No follower recruit dialogue (might happen in buggy Skyrim):
Save game, target NPC in 1st person, open console, test "with setscale 1.1", revert to 1.0, potential follower faction: "addfac 5c84d 1", favor job drunks faction: "addfac 60027 1", close console.

Grey face bug/weird face color/Creating facegen data again:
Open the Construction Kit. Click "File" and " Data".
In the window scroll to RV ASaD and check it with doubleclick and set as active.
Ignore the usual error messages (cancel).
In the Object window navigate to actors/actor/actor/nordrace/female.
Then one-click on the name(s) (0RV2...), hit crtl+F4, no need to save
You can select all 33 and do it in one step.

Don't like something ?
For the easy-to-change stuff:
Change it in the CK or Tes5Edit. Save. Play.
(Inventory, size, hair)
Changes to the face require new FACEGEN DATA !

For the stuff that is stored in your savegame:
(body weight, NPC leveling, opposite gender stance and maybe other things)
Either use console commands on the NPC if you don't want to disable/uncheck the mod or
uncheck ESP, make new game save, change ESP in the CK or Tes5Edit, re-check ESP.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
HISTORY of the mod:

Wanted some of the vanilla NPCs to look different and/or be followers and replace the male Housecarls with females, but some had no follower dialogue, because of their voice: e.g. female nord (took me damn long to figure that out).
Had no spoken dialogue with gender switched Housecarls of course.
Had the idea to make duplicates as relatives with voices that worked.
Expanded and made more and more NPCs over month while learning a lot.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREDITS:
Zillier: for a mod that I always wanted
Jmenaru: for the beautiful swords
author: Mahlzeit88

files.name: RV ASaD 1_2
files.changelogHtml:
added 9 of the girls to the list of the vanilla comment "Stop looking at me like that.",
changes to some AI schedules, added some missing bedroll ownerships, removed unneccesary bedrolls,
forgot to adopt 2 small USKP changes for interior weather in Windhelm

files.name: RV ASaD 1_7
files.changelogHtml: enabled Caldera's "initially disabled" bedroll, changed Botis voice to dark elf, changes tosome NPCs dialogues (repeat time, conditions)

files.name: RV ASaD 1_8
files.changelogHtml: Jordana and Argisa- added to favorfaction (forgotten), Ulrike- scaled horn armor/2xsteel sword/changed hair,Botis- removed from sultryvoice list/added 2nd warhammer (both forgotten), Jordana- added last name, Huki- 2x SteelGS, Mavena- Ingrid- armorebonysimple, Salma and Samaara- minus nightgateinnfaction, all minus potentialmarriagefaction except Elisiana/Lailana, changed some NPC's armor/weapons/inventory, removed ITMs in Moorside Inn

files.name: RV ASaD 2_01
files.changelogHtml:
-most comments now only being used when not following (to not interrupt the flow of FCO)
-YoungEager won't use all 3 greet/byebye comments which was illogical
-2 bugs about Botia

(I hope I sorted out all bull crap of 1.91 and 2.00 now )

files.name: RV ASaD 2_10
files.changelogHtml:
- less use of opposite gender animation
- fixed missing 1st person models for weapons / small dialog changes / changed all to combat classes for a "Fight or Fly" setting
- changes or improvements to daily routine, voice, hair, scars, inventory and placement of several NPCs
- all now have a combat class regarding a certain default option of "Fight or Fly"
Faleenis, Faleena and Argisa will not visit market and tavern (too many NPCs there for my taste)
Faleenis and Faleena now sleep in Faleen's room and hangout/eat near a table near the kitchen.
Argisa now also patrols Understone Keep.
Menara finally leaves the house in the afternoon.
Elisiana finally sleeps (added noble bed), removed from Thalmor Party faction ( didn't work)
Aeris (Anga's Mill) temp. disabled (felt too crowded)
Removed all loot packs from inventories to remove food for FCO's "Got any sausages?" to happen
...some more stuff that I don't remember right now
